All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Action interface federates all kind of Actions.
    Candy
    Candy Class is to create the Candies/Popsicles in the Universe.
    Character
    Character Class is to create the Characters in the Universe.
    ClickAction
    A ClickAction corresponds to a single tap In our case, it's a single tap on the console button (up, down, left, right)
    Clouds
    Clouds Class is to create the Clouds in the Universe.
    Console
    Console Class is to create the Console in the Universe.
    Constants
    Constants Class is to store the Constants values necessary for the elements in the Universe, such as the pixel movement that the Syrup or Character moves, the width and height of the elements (characters, clouds, popsicles, syrups, consoles), and the screen size of the emulator device.
    GraphicsRenderer
    GraphicsRenderer class method is to render the image of the universe or of the game on screen.It does so by drawing the universe on the Canvas that is hold by the SurfaceHolder inside the SurfaceView.
    HomePage
    HomePage class to creates the HomePage of our Game before the users can start the game
    InputHandler
    InputHandler object is the object that gets the input from the inputListener and execute the action.
    InputListener
    The InputListener object can be add as a Listener for any View object.
    InputListener.Callback
    This is the interface a CallBack object has to follow in order to be a valid CallBack for the InputListener.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity class is to create the main game on screen
    MainController
    The MainController is a thread that creates and runs our Universe, IO, and Graphics Renderer at every time.
    MoveCharacterAction
    The MoveCharacterAction class implements the ClickAction class.
    Position
    Position class to construct the x and y coordinate of all our models classes, such as Candy, Character, Clouds, Syrup, and Console
    Syrup
    Syrup Class is to create the Syrup in the Universe.
    Universe
    Universe handles all the actions that are going on in the game.
    Universe.Callback
    Interface Callback is triggered when the universe changes.
